headline: How Executive Share Buying and Restructuring Moves Could Shape Molson Coors (TAP) Investment Outlook
summary: Earlier this month, Molson Coors Beverage Company director Andrew Thomas Molson increased his direct ownership by nearly 50% through an open-market purchase of 7,500 shares, marking the first such direct purchase by Molson in three years. This share purchase closely followed the company's announcement of a restructuring plan that involves eliminating approximately 400 salaried positions to improve profit margins and reflects renewed executive confidence amid recent company challenges. We...
